resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104586</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104586</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202851</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Gas Properties </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gas-Eigenschaften</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propriétés de Gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Propriedades Do Gás</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proprietà Del Gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αέριο ιδιότητες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características Del Gas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Pump gas molecules to a box and see what happens as you change the volume, add or remove heat, change gravity, and more. Measure the temperature and pressure, and discover how the properties of the gas vary in relation to each other.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pumpen Sie Gasmoleküle zu einem Kasten und sehen 
Sie, was geschieht, während Sie den Datenträger ändern, Hitze, 
Änderung Schwerkraft und mehr hinzufügen oder löschen. Messen
Sie die Temperatur und den Druck, und entdecken Sie, wie die 
Eigenschaften des Gases in Beziehung zu einander schwanken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pompez les molécules de gaz dans un cadre et 
voyez ce qui se produit pendant que vous changez le volume, ajoutez ou
retirez la chaleur, la pesanteur de changement, et plus. Mesurez
la température et la pression, et découvrez comment les propriétés
du gaz changent par rapport à l'un l'autre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bombeie moléculas do gás a uma caixa e veja o 
que acontece enquanto você muda o volume, adiciona ou remove o calor,
a gravidade da mudança, e o mais. Meça a temperatura e a 
pressão, e descubra como as propriedades do gás variam com relação
a se.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pompi le molecole del gas ad una casella e veda 
che cosa accade mentre cambiate il volume, aggiungete o rimuovete il 
calore, la gravità del cambiamento e più. Misuri la 
temperatura e la pressione e scopra come le proprietà del gas variano
rispetto a vicenda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα μόρια αντλιών αέριο σε ένα κιβώτιο και 
βλέπουνε τι συμβαίνει δεδομένου ότι αλλάζετε την ένταση 
του ήχου, προσθέτετε ή αφαιρείτε τη θερμότητα, τη βαρύτητα 
αλλαγής, και περισσότερων. Μετρήστε τη θερμοκρασία και την 
πίεση, και ανακαλύψτε πώς οι ιδιότητες ποικίλλουν αέριο στη 
σχέση με κάθε άλλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bombee las moléculas del gas a un rectángulo y 
vea qué sucede mientras que usted cambia el volumen, agrega o quita 
calor, gravedad del cambio, y más. Mida la temperatura y la 
presión, y descubra cómo las características del gas varían en lo 
referente a uno a.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202851</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104586</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/gas-properties</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
